content: आलभ् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To touch; गामालभ्यार्कमीक्ष्य वा <ls>Ms. 5. 87</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">4. 117</ls>; <ls>Bk. 14. 91</ls>; सत्येनायुधमालभे; सत्येन (सत्यं) आत्मानमालभे <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} To get, attain to; अतितरां कांतिमालप्स्यते ते (वपुः) <ls>Me. 15</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; <ls>Kām. 9. 63.</ls> {@--3@} To kill, immolate (as a victim in sacrifices); प्रातर्वै पशूनालभंते <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>; गर्दभं पशुमालभ्य <ls>Y. 3. 280.</ls> {@--4@} To take hold of, seize, grasp, handle. {@--5@} To gain or win over. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To touch. {@--2@} To commence.
